roles.title: Product Designer
roles.description: I lead design projects through the end-to-end design process and help our clients to successfully launch their products.

roles.title: Podcast Host
roles.description: In my free time, I co-host a podcast about [topic].

roles.title: Influencer & Advisor
roles.description: I create educational content about Product Design and Career Growth on Instagram and LinkedIn.

process.title: Research
process.description: Discovering and understanding the problem space and learning about the user. Bonus: Can use data analytics to gain insights from datasets.

process.title: Principles & Strategy
process.description: Creating design principles to help guide the project and UX decisions. Ensures alignment across the team.

process.title: User Journey
process.description: Diving deep into user journey, user stories, and user decision making.

process.title: Exploration
process.description: Exploring a wide range of possible solutions. Testing, iterating, discussing and working through the problem.

process.title: Refinement
process.description: Refining a chosen solution, polishing until it’s ready for handover to the developers. Documenting design decisions.

process.title: Handover
process.description: Working closely with the dev team to ensure a successful handover and implementation process. Can be an extra pair of hands for front-end implementation.

process.title: Supporting
process.description: Keep monitoring implementation process, in case improvements need to be made.

values.title: Curiosity
values.description: When tasked with a challenge, I always start solving problems by asking 'What if?' My curiosity leads me to innovative solutions.

values.title: Challenge Assumptions
values.description: I prefer to test my assumptions with real users every time I can, and base my solutions on research data.

values.title: Attention to Detail
values.description: Great design is always in the details. I double-check everything to ensure nothing is missed.
